name: KeyShred
description:
Done in 48 Hours for The GGJ at Davis!

Controls:

WASD + Spacebar Movement

[Tab] or [~](tilda)  while moving to toggle Shredding mode

Aim at the boss to automatically track him while shredding

Shredding Controls:

Hold your keyboard like a guitar!

Left Hand:

[1-5] - Pentatonic Scale

[E] - F note(4th)

[R] - B note(7th)

Right Hand:

Up/Down Arrow Keys - Strum(Plays notes held down on LHand at once)

Left Arrow Key - Up Octave

Right Arrow Key - Down Octave

Thanks to Ryan for helping out with the control scheme lol
